item.title: CVE-2024-31422|2024-04-15T10:08:01.343Z -- Philippe Bernard -- Favicon
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Philippe Bernard Favicon.This issue affects Favicon: from n/a through 1.3.29.
